testcase.name: Verify successful login with valid credentials
Verify user should be able to see Welcome text
Verify user should be able to see all fields in dashboard page
Verify user should be able to navigate profile page through Profile picture
Verify user should be able Search a Nasher
Verify user should be able to Change to French Language from dropdown
Verify user should be able to Change to English Language from dropdown
Verify user should be able to Change Application view to Light Mode
Verify user should be able to Change Application view to Dark Mode
Verify user should be able to see Last Contribution
Verify user should be able to see Contribution on Motivation tile
Verify user should be able to click see all button for Daily motivation tile
Verify user should be able to Like specific Contribution
Verify user should be able to Dislike specific Contribution
Verify user should be able to send a Comment on specific Contribution
Verify user should be able to Share specific Contribution on social media
Verify user should be able to navigate Profile page through Settings button
Verify user should be able to click on points and redirect to profile page
Verify user should be able to click on Overall ranks and redirect to profile page
Verify user should be able to click on Overall score and redirect to profile page
Verify user should be able to Logout through Settings button
